description:
A true artist doesn’t really need expensive tools and materials to produce something beautiful, and San Antonio artist Rob Ferrel is the perfect example. For months, he has been treating his Instagram followers with  highly realist portraits that he creates using nothing but salt, a few brushes, and a piece of cardstock.一个真正艺术家创作美的东西是不需要昂贵的工具和原料的，圣安东尼奥市的艺术家罗伯·费雷尔就是典型的例子。数月以来，他就一直用食盐，几把刷子和一块卡纸创作高度现实主义的肖像画供他在Instagram上的粉丝观赏。

Ferrel begins by pouring salt on a table and then moves it around with brushes until recognizable features begin to emerge. He also uses cardstock for clean, sharp lines. Once the portrait is ready, he photographs it and posts it to Instagram, and then gathers up all the salt to make his next masterpiece.费雷尔首先把食盐倒在桌子上，用刷子将盐匀开，知道人物特征开始显现。之后用卡纸清理、描线。待他的人物画作完成，他便会拍下照片上传到Instagram上，然后把所有的盐重新回收以便制作他下一副著作。

瞧，这不是比伯么！

食盐版总统山!

这位小哥还在披萨上作画呢！不过，看着长着一张张明星大腕的脸的披萨，你下得了口么？

The San Antonio-based barber and artist is combining his skills by creating portraits of celebrities on his clients' heads. 这位圣安东尼奥市的理发师兼艺术家还会在顾客头上理出名人肖像发型。

Rob Ferrel has spent the last few years studying the faces of various well known stars and working out how to define their features on a human scalp. 罗伯·费雷尔花了几年的时间观察各知名明星的脸，研究怎样才能把他们的脸“画”在人的头皮上。

His work has become so popular that clients have travelled from across America to get their idols faces imprinted onto their heads.他的作品非常受欢迎，客人们从美国四面八方到他这儿为的就是把自己偶像的脸“印”在自己的头上。
